2164.subject: MPA
2164.course_title_long: Music of Latin America and the Caribbean
2164.descrlong: This course will provide students an overview and understanding of the roots of music throughout Latin America, the Caribbean and Latinos/Chicanos in the United States.  In addition, students will be exposed to the use of music in Latino/Chicano film and how musical effects and styles contribute to the significance of scene meaning.  (Credit/No Credit Available)
